name: minimal-mistakes
description: Minimal Mistakes Jekyll theme npm build scripts
author: Michael Rose

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-1.12.1.min.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.fitvids.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.magnific-popup.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.smooth-scroll.min.js assets/js/plugins/jquery-ui.min.js assets/js/plugins/stickyfill.min.js assets/js/_main.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.preprocess-schemas: rm -rf tmp/raml* && mkdir -p tmp/raml && cp -rf ../src/main/resources/raml/* tmp/raml && rm -rf tmp/raml/schemas/* && bin/bundle-schemas -i ../src/main/resources/raml/schemas -o tmp/raml/schemas
scripts.raml2html: npm run preprocess-schemas && node_modules/raml2html/bin/raml2html -t lib/raml2html-template.nunjucks -i tmp/raml/wiremock-admin-api.raml -o _docs/wiremock-admin-api.html
scripts.apidocs: npm run raml2html && mkdir -p ../src/main/resources/swagger && node_modules/api-spec-converter/bin/api-spec-converter -f raml -t swagger_2 tmp/raml/wiremock-admin-api.raml > ../src/main/resources/swagger/wiremock-admin-api.json
